473590.name: 1979 Revolution: Black Friday Original Soundtrack
473590.description:
1979 Revolution: Black Friday's original soundtrack by Nima Fakhrara features 21 tracks of original music both from and inspired by the game.

File will be installed to:
...Steam\steamapps\common\1979 Revolution\1979 Revolution Official Soundtrack

Track Listing


1. 1979
2. Dirt
3. Move With It
4. Sorrow and Hope
5. Time Is Now
6. Tehran
7. Theatre and Hope
8. Friday Kisses
9. Hafez
10. Dreams
11. Empty Streets
12. Hand in Hand
13. Let Go
14. The Death
15. Save Him
16. Keep It Now
17. Speech
18. Time Has Passed
19. The Fire
20. Sorrow
21. Lajevardi Suite

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
